title: K-12 Early Childhood English Teaching Methodology Through Music: Short-Intensive Online Course

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic English grammar and vocabulary
context.additional_context: Emphasis on music-integrated teaching strategies optimized for smartphone-based online classes

learning_goals: Learners can teach five or more basic vocabulary words to young children using English nursery rhymes.
Learners can naturally convey verb conjugation sentences (syntax) to young children by applying rhythmic patterns.
Learners can provide formative assessment feedback using music recordings made with smartphones.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
